phases.focus: Understand what GSAP is, core syntax, and how to animate elements smoothly.
topics: What GSAP is & Why to Use It
Core Properties (Basics): x, y, scale, rotate
Transformations: xPercent, yPercent, transformOrigin, Rotations (2D basics)
Easing Types: Bounce, Elastic, Expo, Back
Stagger Property Basics (stagger amount, direction, ease)
Performance Tips: GPU acceleration, will-change, autoAlpha

phases.phase_name: Phase 2: Intermediate Level (Timelines, Control, and Utilities)
phases.focus: Learn sequencing, callbacks, and timeline control for complex animations.
topics: Chaining Multiple Tweens in a Timeline
Controlling Animations with Buttons and Events
Callbacks: onStart, onUpdate, onComplete, onRepeat, onReverseComplete
GSAP Utility Functions: gsap.utils.random(), wrap(), distribute(), selector()
gsap.set() (Jump elements to a state instantly)

phases.phase_name: Phase 3: Advanced Level (Scroll, SVG, Motion, and Plugins)
phases.focus: Master ScrollTrigger, MotionPath, SVG animations, and advanced timeline control.
topics: ScrollTrigger Callbacks (onEnter, onLeave, onEnterBack, onLeaveBack, onToggle, onUpdate)
SplitText Plugin (Animating text by letters, words, lines)
Advanced Timeline Control: Nested timelines, Labels, seek(), tweenTo()
QuickSetter (Optimizing rapid updates for smoother animations)

phases.phase_name: Phase 4: Framework Integration and Utilities (Pro Workflows)
phases.focus: Integrate GSAP with modern frameworks and tools for real-world animation systems.
topics: Using gsap.defaults() for clean global configs
ScrollTrigger Advanced: scrollerProxy, normalizeScroll(), refresh(), kill()
Debugging with markers: true and ScrollTrigger.refresh()
Performance Optimization: batching, caching selectors, minimizing reflows
Integrating GSAP with Lottie or Canvas Animations
Using gsap.utils.wrap(), random(), clamp(), interpolate(), snap()
Exporting animations as reusable JS modules

phases.phase_name: Phase 5: Master Level (Pro Animations & Real Projects)
phases.focus: Create professional, storytelling, and high-performance GSAP animations.
topics: Building Complex Landing Page Animations (Hero, Navbar, Text)
Text Reveal Animations with SplitText + Timeline
Menu Transitions and Overlay Animations (from/fromTo usage)
Parallax Sections using ScrollTrigger + Multiple Layers
Creating a Scroll-based Hero Scene (ScrollTrigger + Timeline)
Building a GSAP Animation Manager for Multi-section Sites
Combining GSAP + WebGL / Canvas for Next-Level Effects
